Song.title: Heavenly Father, Beautiful Son
Song.copyright: Words and Music by Mark Altrogge © 2005 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [||: A | E | Bm | D :||]
Verse 1: [F#m]Father, You loved me,{,} sent Your [C#]Son to redeem [F#m]Jesus, You washed me,{,} by Your [D2]blood I am clean [D2]Spir[E]it, You’ve [C#m]o[D]pened{,} [D]these [E]blinded [C#m]eyes And brought me to [D]Christ
Chorus: [A]Heavenly Father, [E]beautiful Son Sp[Bm7]irit of light and [D]truth [A]Thank You for bringing [E]sinners To come to [Bm7 | D (repeat chorus)]You
Verse 2: [F#m]Father, You gave me to [C#]Jesus to keep And [F#m]Jesus, You love me,{,} as a [D2]shepherd, his sheep [D]Spir[E]it, You’ve [C#m]giv[D]en me{,} [D]faith [E]in the [C#m]Son And made our hearts [D]one
Verse 3: [F#m]Father, You’re waiting{,} to [C#]hear my requests [F#m]Jesus, Your loving open h[D2]and{,} is outstretched [D]Spir[E]it, You’re [C#m]in [D]me,{,} [D]You [E]inter[C#m]cede And help in my [D]need
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 father you loved me sent your son to redeem jesus you washed me by your blood i am clean spirit youve opened these blinded eyes and brought me to christ chorus heavenly father beautiful son spirit of light and truth thank you for bringing sinners to come to you verse 2 father you gave me to jesus to keep and jesus you love me as a shepherd his sheep spirit youve given me faith in the son and made our hearts one verse 3 father youre waiting to hear my requests jesus your loving open hand is outstretched spirit youre in me you intercede and help in my need
